title: tAna rUpam
sahitya:
tAnarUpam aduvE tannait-tandu tathAkAram AvaduvE AnandamAna


anupallavi

  InanbE rAsaiyinri vAna mazhai pOlE iyarkkaiyin Ikai pOl suyanalam illAda


caraNam    AdittanukkE tan Aviyait-tandiDum alai kaDal pOlavE nilai perum anbirkkE
jAti mata nira bhEdamillAmalE tanda sutantara bandhamil cintaiyE
